HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 0 Kč - 199 Kč. Doprava zdarma při hodnotě nákupu nad 2 500 Kč.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 0 Kč - 590 Kč. Doprava zdarma při hodnotě nákupu nad 23 900 Kč. Doručení s vynáškou přímo do bytu za 690 Kč.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: 0 Kč - 69 Kč. Zdarma při nákupu nad 2 500 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: 0 Kč - 69 Kč. Zdarma při nákupu nad 2 500 Kč.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: 0 Kč - 59 Kč. Zdarma při nákupu nad 2 500 Kč.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Muziker.cz offers a comprehensive range of delivery methods in Czechia, including standard home delivery, bulky item delivery, parcel shops, parcel lockers, and in-store pickup.
PROVIDERS: Key delivery partners are DPD, GLS, Geis (for bulky items), Zásilkovna, and DHL for express services.
PRICING: Standard delivery costs range from 0 Kč to 199 Kč, with free shipping on orders over 2,500 Kč. Bulky item delivery costs 0 Kč to 590 Kč, with free shipping over 23,900 Kč. Pickup at parcel shops/lockers costs 0 Kč to 69 Kč, also free over 2,500 Kč. In-store pickup is priced at 0 Kč to 59 Kč.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Express air delivery is available via DHL. A special service for bulky items includes delivery with placement inside the apartment for a fixed fee of 690 Kč via Geis. Cash on delivery is available for most services (except DHL Express), but the specific surcharge is not mentioned.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented on a clear, dedicated page. All delivery methods are well-defined with associated costs, delivery times, and size/weight limits. The primary piece of missing information is the exact cost for the cash on delivery service.
